message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000.  It's a great deal for both of us, as you know the value of this product is well over that. Let's work together to make this happen.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $900,000 is still below what I need to make this worthwhile. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I'm firm on $950,000. This is a fair price considering the value of this product to you.  Let's reach an agreement in this round!

I understand your perspective, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $925,000. This is my final offer, as I don't want to go any higher. Can you consider it?
